newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: RM Props talks continue, issues cautionary.
newsitem.headline: RM Props talks continue, issues cautionary.

text.p: RMP Properties Ltd cautioned on Wednesday that it was still involved in talks which could have an effect on the shares in the company.

This follows a cautionary at the beginning of December dealing with the proposed rationalisation of listings and capital restructure of RMP and Barprop Ltd. There was another joint cautionary in December regarding the potential purchase by Randgold & Exploration Company Ltd of RMP's land clearing and gold recovery operation, RMP's participation therein and the potential involvement of other parties.
The group said a further announcement would be made within the next six weeks.
